attributes.action: make it law that cats should be reported if hit by a car or bike etc
attributes.additional_details: Our little fur baby is coming up 3 years old she's a beautiful natured cat who enjoyed exploring out our back. She has been hit and treat as rubbish and they're isn't anything I can do. Our family is devestated please stop cats being treat like vermin and disposed of. Dogs have rights why not cats too! Stop discriminating because police use dogs. If they used cats they would have rights. Stop cats being left untreated. Stop unnessary deaths!
attributes.background: Our gorgeous fur baby was hit at speed that knocked her unconscious. After they've hit her they've picked her up and thrown her into a bush where she's died alone and in pain. Make it law so cats must be reported so families get the chance of saving their fur babies!
